data.name: Pixelcivilization's Creator
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Pixelcivilization's Creator.
The story takes place on a magical land where everyone has the ability to use card magic.
The world is littered with cards transformed from great heroes.
If you get one of these character cards, you will be extremely powerful.
Each hero card has different weapons and skills, allowing you to develop endless gameplay.
Use a variety of ways to eliminate other card wizards.
Unlike other card games, we do not need to pay a high fee to obtain cards, everyone can draw hero cards by fighting to obtain points.
All weapon cards and strategy cards are freely available within the card group, and you can use them freely in battle.
At the same time, we will select the best players of each season and make them into cards as new spirits, so that every player has the chance to become a part of the powerful power in the game.

data.short_description: It's a card strategy game. The game takes the turn-based battle mode, each game will have four players to participate. Players can choose their hero cards in each round and switch them in subsequent rounds. Find ways to eliminate other players during your turn.
